title: Construction of the proposed Police Mess and Barracks building at Mirihana in Nugegoda
decision_details: - The initial construction work up to the 3rd floor of the six storey building  proposed to be constructed for the Police Mess and Barracks in the Mirihana area in Nugegoda has been completed in the year 2008. Bids have been called to select a suitable contractor to complete the balance construction work of the building and accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. Sajith Premadasa, the Minister of Housing and Construction, to award the contract to M/s. Sripalie Contractors (Pvt) Ltd., the lowest substantially responsive bidder for a sum of Rs.340.6 million as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
